Package org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface MaintenanceAPI

  • public interface MaintenanceAPI
    This API gives access to maintenance administration tasks such as enabling maintenance mode and also enable/disable maintenance message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void disableMaintenanceMessage()
      Disable maintenance message
      void disableMaintenanceMode()
      Disable maintenance mode This method replaces TenantAdministrationAPI.resume()
      void enableMaintenanceMessage()
      Enable maintenance message
      void enableMaintenanceMode()
      Enable maintenance mode This method replaces TenantAdministrationAPI.pause() When maintenance mode is enabled, All BPM and BDM APIs are not accessible.
      MaintenanceDetails getMaintenanceDetails()
      Retrieve platform maintenance details
      void updateMaintenanceMessage​(String message)
      Update maintenance message This message will be displayed in bonita apps if enabled

    • Method Detail

      • getMaintenanceDetails

        MaintenanceDetails getMaintenanceDetails()
                                  throws MaintenanceDetailsNotFoundException,
                                         PlatformNotFoundException
        Retrieve platform maintenance details
        Returns:
        MaintenanceInfo
        Throws:
        MaintenanceDetailsNotFoundException
        PlatformNotFoundException

      • enableMaintenanceMode

        void enableMaintenanceMode()
                    throws UpdateException
        Enable maintenance mode This method replaces TenantAdministrationAPI.pause() When maintenance mode is enabled, All BPM and BDM APIs are not accessible.
        Throws:
        UpdateException - if maintenance state cannot be updated.

      • disableMaintenanceMode

        void disableMaintenanceMode()
                     throws UpdateException
        Disable maintenance mode This method replaces TenantAdministrationAPI.resume()
        Throws:
        UpdateException - if maintenance state cannot be updated.

      • updateMaintenanceMessage

        void updateMaintenanceMessage​(String message)
                       throws UpdateException
        Update maintenance message This message will be displayed in bonita apps if enabled
        Throws:
        UpdateException - if maintenance message cannot be updated.

      • enableMaintenanceMessage

        void enableMaintenanceMessage()
                       throws UpdateException
        Enable maintenance message
        Throws:
        UpdateException - if maintenance message cannot be enabled.

      • disableMaintenanceMessage

        void disableMaintenanceMessage()
                        throws UpdateException
        Disable maintenance message
        Throws:
        UpdateException - if maintenance message cannot be disabled.
